Posts.EditableText:
Thanks, I've fixed this now to point at the Libraries and Code Samples forum.

FYI the documentation is itself open source - you can access it at https://github.com/textadventures/quest/tree/gh-pages. You can fork it, make edits and then submit a pull request to get your changes onto the documentation site.
Posts.HTML:
Thanks, I've fixed this now to point at the Libraries and Code Samples forum.

FYI the documentation is itself open source - you can access it at https://github.com/textadventures/quest/tree/gh-pages. You can fork it, make edits and then submit a pull request to get your changes onto the documentation site.
